events.message: I just received my order and noticed that the smartphone screen is cracked and the device is not functioning properly.
The reported issue involves a broken device, categorizing this case under Product Defect for further handling.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah M. who specialises in handling product defects.
Hello, I’m Sarah from support. Sorry to hear about the cracked screen. Let’s work together to fix this issue as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the damaged smartphone and let us know if the box was damaged upon delivery?
I took pictures of the cracked screen and the package. The box was slightly dented but not extensively damaged. Sending photos now.
Thanks for the photos. We can offer a replacement device shipped to you immediately or a full refund once you return the defective smartphone.
I would prefer a replacement device as I need it for work urgently. Please let me know how soon it can be shipped.
We have processed your replacement order. It will be shipped within 24 hours and you should receive tracking details shortly.
Just checking in to ensure your replacement smartphone arrived and is working correctly. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
We are closing this case as resolved based on your confirmation of receiving the replacement device in good condition.
